 000000    50  #Assuimg rated torque of 230Nm ->  50 throttle == 11.5Nm
 050000   100  #Target_torque = rated_torqe * throttle / 1000
 100000   150
 150000   200
 200000   250
 250000   300
 300000   350
 350000   400
 400000   450
 450000   500
 500000   550
 550000   600
 600000   650
 650000   700
 700000   750
 750000   800
 800000   850
 850000   900
 900000   950
1000000  1000 #1 seconds in, full power

7000000   860 #7 seconds in, start reducing power

8000000   650 #8 seconds in

9000000   625 #9 seconds in
10000000  600 # Continue decreasing power 
11000000  575 
12000000  550 
13000000  525
14000000  500

15000000  450 #15 seconds in
